Package org.bonitasoft.engine.api

Interface LoginAPI

All Known Subinterfaces:
LoginAPI
public interface LoginAPI
The LoginAPI allows to log in (and out) onto the Engine. This is a mandatory step to go further using the Engine APIs. Other Engine APIs are only accessible through the returned APISession.
Author:
Matthieu Chaffotte, Zhang Bole
See Also:
  • APISession

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    APISession
    login(String userName, String password)
    Connects the user in order to use API methods of the default tenant.
    APISession

    Connects the user in order to use API methods of the default tenant.
    void

    Disconnects the logged user on a tenant according to the given session.

  • Method Details

    • login

      APISession login(String userName, String password) throws LoginException, UnknownUserException
      Connects the user in order to use API methods of the default tenant.
      Parameters:
      userName - the user name
      password - the password
      Returns:
      the session to use with other tenant API methods
      Throws:
      LoginException - occurs when an exception is thrown during login
      UnknownUserException - occurs when the user trying to login is unknown to the engine

    • login

      APISession login(Map<String,Serializable> credentials) throws LoginException
      Connects the user in order to use API methods of the default tenant.
      Parameters:
      credentials - the properties to use to login
      Returns:
      the session to use with other tenant API methods
      Throws:
      LoginException - occurs when an exception is thrown during login

    • logout

      void logout(APISession session) throws SessionNotFoundException, LogoutException
      Disconnects the logged user on a tenant according to the given session.
      Parameters:
      session - the tenant session
      Throws:
      SessionNotFoundException - if the given session is not found on the server side. This may occurs when the session has expired.
      LogoutException - occurs when an exception is thrown during the logout
